page.title: 18A Schoolday. N.Runcton
page.content: Extracts from a diary by Simon Dealtry aged 13 who lives at North Runcton and attends Springwood High School in Kings Lynn. "I am woken at half past seven by the alarm on my digital watch, but sometimes my cat wakes me up. ... At school lunchtimes I usually have a beefburger in a roll with chips and baked beans. Sometimes I buy a drink which comes in a small carton. ... I arrive home at a quarter to four. I change into a pair of jeans and a T-shirt. Then I do my{homework which takes me about half an hour. After that I normally watch{television until teatime. This evening it is shepherds pie and broccoli. After I've eaten my tea I go for a bath or shower. This evening I washed my hair under the shower. I go to bed at about nine o'clock in the evening."
